articles.description: Kilonova explosions from neutron star collisions may damage atmospheres and threaten life if nearby, according to a new study.
articles.content: There has been a growing focus on celestial explosions called kilonova events. These eruptions happen when two dense stars, known as neutron stars, crash into each other and release bursts of matter,… [+6075 chars]
